install.name: Content - Joomla Extra News Plugin
install.author: Viet Nguyenhoang
install.description:
Plugin - Extra News 2.0.7 - Created by Nguyen Hoang Viet, April 2008

This mambot creates a list of related and/or newer and/or older news items of the same category of the present topic.
Visit this link How to install and using 'plugin_extranews' for more details.

param.name: enabled
param.label: Enable Plugin
param.description: Enable or Disable Plugin

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: sectionid_list
param.label: Disable section id List
param.description:
List of section ids that this plugin is disable. Each id is separated by ','
for example 2,3,8
'-' means no disable sections

param.name: catid_list
param.label: Disable category id List
param.description:
List of category ids that this plugin is disable. Each id is separated by ','
for example 1,5,6
'-' means no disable categories

param.name: id_list
param.label: Disable article id List
param.description:
List of article ids that this plugin is disable. Each id is separated by ','
for example 1,4,9
'-' means no disable articles

param.name: sectionid_list_rsform
param.label: Disable section id List with Rsform
param.description:
List of section ids that this plugin is disable. Each id is separated by ','
for example 2,3,8
'-' means no disable sections

param.name: catid_list_rsform
param.label: Disable category id List with Rsform
param.description:
List of category ids that this plugin is disable. Each id is separated by ','
for example 1,5,6
'-' means no disable categories

param.name: id_list_rsform
param.label: Disable article id List with Rsform
param.description:
List of article ids that this plugin is disable. Each id is separated by ','
for example 1,4,9
'-' means no disable articles

param.name: queryby
param.label: Query by
param.description: Which one you choose

param.name: char_count_title
param.label: Linked Title Char Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item title text in the linked title. 0 will show all the text

param.name: relateditemscount
param.label: Number of related items
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: neweritemscount
param.label: Number of newer news items
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: oderitemscount
param.label: Number of older news items
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: showdate
param.label: Show date with title
param.description: Show date before linked title!

param.name: showdateformat
param.label: Created date display
param.description: Format of created date display date (d) month (m, M) year (y, Y) hour (H) minute (i) examples: d/m/Y->1/9/2006 d/m/y->1/9/06 d-m-Y->1-9-2006.

param.name: linkedtitleformat
param.label: Linked title format with date
param.description:
Format of linked title format with date, where %1$s is date and %2$s is linked title. You can use these formats:
+%1$s - %2$s
+%2$s %1$s and Created date display is '(d/m/Y H:i)'
